quest.name: Bereft of Hearth and Home
journal: Rhalgr's Reach is no longer safe, as Pipin well knows.
objectives: Search the infirmary for medical supplies.
Give the medical supplies to the Flame courier.

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: I'll recover. My injuries aren't serious─though that was clearly by choice and not happenstance. They meant to take me alive.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: You're worried about Y'shtola, aren't you? <sigh> It's too early to make any kind of prognosis, but...she's alive. For now.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text:
If it wasn't for her, it'd be me lying there...
...I wish it was.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Our defeat was no near thing. It was total─a humiliation. We were powerless to withstand our enemy's assault.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: But we cannot afford to dwell on our failure. As Alphinaud said, it is those who survived whom we must think of now.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Rhalgr's Reach is no longer safe. The imperials may have withdrawn, but they could return at any time to finish what they began. We dare not remain here.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Those who are not fit to make the journey to Castrum Oriens will need to be taken by chocobo carriage. Agreed?

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Good. I shall oversee preparations for the carriages. In the meantime, I would have you scour the infirmary for any supplies that might prove useful during the journey.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Forgive me, but it is imperative that I continue preparing medicines for the wounded. If you desire treatment, I must ask that you seek it elsewhere.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Oh, I see... In that case, you are free to search the Barber and take that which you require. I would not have our people dying en route.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: I would assist you, but this process demands my undivided attention.

dialogue.name: ORELLA
dialogue.text: Take whatever you require for your needs. I will replenish the stock after.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We're to move the wounded to Castrum Oriens? Understood. I'll go and see if anyone requires assistance.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I will accompany Commander Kemp in one of the carriages.

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: No, no, I'd hate to be a burden...

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: We'll need to carry Y'shtola to the carriage. Could you give me a hand, Lyse?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: As if you need to ask!

dialogue.name: FLAMECOURIER
dialogue.text: [GC Rank] SurnameMissSir. Marshal Tarupin said you might have something for me?

dialogue.name: FLAMECOURIER
dialogue.text: Twelve be praised. This should put the drivers' hearts at ease. Tell the vice marshal we await his orders.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Y'shtola and the others are safely strapped in. Don't worry─I'll be by her side the entire time.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Thank you, Krile.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I'll walk alongside. They'll need protection in case the Garleans try anything.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Hang on. You're injured too, aren't you? Shouldn't you be in one of the carriages?

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: I'm not so frail that I can't make the trip on my own. Besides, there's still work to be done here. I'll see you at the Wall when it's finished.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: As you wish. Then let us set forth at once. We shall move as quickly as our comrades' health allows.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: To Castrum Oriens!
